video.title: Freaks and Geeks
video.synopsis: A group of high school students in 1980 faces various social struggles. Lindsay rebels and hangs out with a crowd of burnouts for starters.

episodes.synopsis: Studious "mathlete" Lindsay starts hanging out with a group of burnouts, worrying her parents. Lindsay's brother, Sam, struggles to confront a bully.
episodes.title: Pilot Episode

episodes.synopsis: With her parents out of town, Lindsay throws a party at the house to impress Daniel. Wary of alcohol, Sam's friends replace the keg with fake beer.
episodes.title: Beers and Weirs

episodes.synopsis: Sam convinces Bill and Neal to trick-or-treat on Halloween, but they end up embarrassed while Lindsay and her friends wreak havoc in the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Tricks and Treats

episodes.synopsis: Kim's friend, Karen, bullies Sam and calls him a geek. Kim invites Lindsay to dinner at her house, exposing Lindsay to the abuse Kim takes at home.
episodes.title: Kim Kelly Is My Friend

episodes.synopsis: Lindsay offers to help Daniel study for an algebra test, but ends up accused by the teacher of cheating. Daniel lends sexually naive Sam a porn film.
episodes.title: Tests and Breasts

episodes.synopsis: Nick feels that focusing on his drumming is the only way to avoid going into the military. Insecure Sam refuses to shower after gym class.
episodes.title: I'm With the Band

episodes.synopsis: Lindsay and the freaks go to great lengths to get fake IDs to see a local band at a bar. The geeks befriend a pretty new transfer student.
episodes.title: Carded and Discarded

episodes.synopsis: Nick starts to show an obsessive interest in Lindsay, which leaves her feeling creeped out. Sam is jealous that Bill and Cindy are science partners.
episodes.title: Girlfriends and Boyfriends

episodes.synopsis: Sam's plan to woo Cindy by becoming the school mascot goes awry. Lindsay wants to break up with Nick. The freaks battle students from a rival school.
episodes.title: We've Got Spirit

episodes.synopsis: Tired of being harassed by Coach Fredricks, Bill lashes out with prank phone calls. Lindsay's parents violate her trust by reading her diary.
episodes.title: The Diary

episodes.synopsis: Lindsay rejoins the mathletes and reconnects with Millie after her folks ground her for crashing their car. Sam tries to dress well to impress Cindy.
episodes.title: Looks and Books

episodes.synopsis: Sam and Bill tell Neal they saw his father with a woman who isn't Neal's mom. Ken has a crush on a girl who plays tuba in the school marching band.
episodes.title: The Garage Door

episodes.synopsis: Lindsay smokes pot for the first time, forgetting that she's scheduled to baby-sit a neighbor. Bill nearly dies when he accidentally eats peanuts.
episodes.title: Chokin' and Tokin'

episodes.synopsis: Lindsay and Kim accidentally run over Millie's dog. Nick writes a love ballad for Lindsay. Bill is horrified that Mr. Fredricks is dating his mom.
episodes.title: Dead Dogs and Gym Teachers

episodes.synopsis: Daniel changes his appearance in an attempt to impress a punk girl named Jenna. Neal is obsessed with ventriloquism at the expense of his studies.
episodes.title: Noshing and Moshing

episodes.synopsis: Sam asks Cindy to go to a party after she tells Bill that she has a crush on Sam. Nick stays with the Weirs following a confrontation with his father.
episodes.title: Smooching and Mooching

episodes.synopsis: Ken questions his sexuality after his girlfriend reveals a secret. Sam becomes fed up with dating Cindy. George Bush visits McKinley for an assembly.
episodes.title: The Little Things

episodes.synopsis: The freaks find out that Nick is entering a disco competition with his new girlfriend. Lindsay faces a decision that could set her life on a new path.
episodes.title: Discos and Dragons
